评论概述: Wife Loves It! Great Quality Sweater!
评论详情: We picked this sweater up well before winter, so my wife hasn’t had many chances to wear it until the last month or so. In that time, she’s been really impressed with both the quality and the overall fit, even with its oversized design. My wife loves oversized sweaters, and this one absolutely fits the bill—it’s cozy, stylish, and exactly what she was hoping for.  One thing to keep in mind is the size of the holes in the knit. Since this is a high-gauge knit sweater, air does pass through certain parts of the design, making it better suited for layering. It’s perfect for pairing with a long-sleeve top or thermal underneath, but it might not be ideal as your only layer on a really cold day.  In this price range, there is certainly a lot of great competition you could choose from, but I will say the quality of the sweater goes a long way towards warranting its price. All in all, as long as you’re planning to layer it, I think you’ll be really happy with this one. It’s a great combination of comfort, style, and quality!
Wore this for family pictures and it is the perfect color and it is very comfortable.

So I order things from Amazon often, it usually will suggest a size. In this case the size was medium. I am a size 8 so this seemed about right. The arms in this sweater are so short and the sweater itself is clingy for being “oversized”. The color doesn’t match the photo, it’s more gray. Wish I’d saved my money.
Luckily, I still like the sweater I received but it looks nothing like what's pictured and it's hand wash only. There is no braided patterns whatsoever but it's soft and comfy.

The color of the sweater is exactly as shown the size is great. It’s slightly oversize so just baggy enough for a cute talk in the front of your jeans or a little longer with leggings very comfortable not see-through. It is a thicker sweater, so definitely warm
This sweater had a terrible odor when it arrived and was not any better after washing. I threw it out.
Love this sweater! The color (gray) is beautiful. Fits oversize so can be layered for extra warmth. Nice quality. Very soft. Haven’t washed/dried it yet.

I have been looking for a cream sweater like this forever and have bought several off of Amazon that I have ended up returning, but this one is perfect! I felt like there was a lot of conflicting reviews on this sweater, but here’s what I found: -If the cream sweater is against white, then yes it has a slight pink tone to it, but against any other color it looks like the perfect cream color. -It’s the perfect amount of oversized if you just order your normal size! -Its soft and cozy and flattering and does not need anything to be worn under it. Buy it!!
I love this sweater! It’s a classic staple. The fabric is soft and the quality is great. It washes well and fits true to size. It’s easy to style and the color is as shown.

I wore this as an oversized sweater over a skirt, because it hit right around my butt. First of all, it will shrink like crazy in any temp, so it’s no longer oversized. It also is now ripping. Bummer.

Received this sweater for Christmas and I love it - very very warm and fits perfectly (I found the arms were a little long but I dont mind that) - Highly recommend if you are in the market for a sweater to keep you toasty on a cold winter night

I love this sweater! It’s the perfect cold day winter sweater. The fit is loose which is perfect for layering underneath if you live in a cold climate. The knit is well done and compares to the Free People cable knit sweater that sells for a lot more. Great quality! I definitely recommend it.
I ordered the cream one and it came and it was clearly yellow not cream. I thought it was a bit long, but the quality was nice.

Love love love this sweater! It runs big, but looks great with jeans, joggers, mini skirt and boots! Great piece to incorporate into your wardrobe. Does shrink a tiny bit in wash, but not bad at all!  It is very comfortable and great bang for your buck!

Very cute, but disappointed with the color  The color name is white and it looks true white on the model but it is a yellow-white  I am happy with the fit…normally I wear a small or medium and the small was perfect for that oversized look (I’m short so it was longer on me than the main pic on the model)  Color -

The cream color has a hint of pink to it in person.
My wife loved it for its warmth.  Nice to wear in the house to keep her cozy.  Very satisfied.

评论概述: So soft, so Rory Gilmore chic!
评论详情: I bought a vintage LL Bean version of this sweater and it pales in comparison. This sweater is super soft and comfy and warm. I sized up because I wanted it to be slouchy and I can even wear it with leggings with minimal bum self-consciousness. It’s a perfect ivory, not like a speckled oatmeal. The sleeves are not tight and I can cuff them since I sized up. I do like to wear my millennial emotional support cami under it since the weave is a little loose. This is a new staple for me wardrobe and I feel very Gilmore Girls in it which was my whole goal!
Lint was getting everywhere so I will be returning this. However, it is pretty true-to-size if lint doesn’t bother you and also the material feels soft.
It was a beautiful knit sweater and really great quality
Matches everything very comfortable and very soft. I usually wear a large and I bought a small and it was perfect.

I bought this for my granddaughter. When I open the package, I was delighted with the quality of the sweater. When she put it on, the color, the pattern, and the style combined and confirmed that this was awonderful, attractive purchase. You can’t go wrong on this one..
Looks cute, medium weight and washed nicely (laid flat to dry).  Looked cute with shiny black leggings.  Would recommend!
Love this sweater. Fits nice, love the oversize. It’s by no means the softest sweater in the world, but I like the feel of it as it won’t be too stuffy or hot when wearing.
Since it’s oversized I did go down a couple of sizes and it still fits! I love how thick and warm this sweater is. Might get another one in other colors.

I love this sweater!  I’m wearing a large and it is definitely oversized. I love that it’s longer in the back and it covers my backside.  It’s really loose under the arms so it’s in no way fitted.  You can easily layer under this sweater.  This sweater is a medium weight so it’s not super bulky.  I love it so much and I will try a medium and see how that one fits.  It washed up well in a mesh bag on gentle cycle in cold water and I hung it to dry.  No shrinkage.  The mesh bags help keep garnets from stretching out during wash. I don’t put any of my garments in the dryer.  The best part of this sweater for me is that is 60% cotton which means it breathes.  I love cotton.

I thought it looked more like a cotton blend, but it's not at all. It will be really warm for those of you in cold places. The sizing is perfect, and this color was gorgeous! I returned it only because of the material!!
